segments.text: I see the kitchen with cabinets open and dishes around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying that plate, but the faucet's blasting water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing sink, what a sloppy mess on the counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water dripping down the cabinets, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, ugh, that's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing for cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's tilting, and crumbs will be everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging for a cookie, probably sticky hands all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be a slippery, dirty hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden outside can't hide this filth inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such carelessness leading to grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, waiting to get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just revolting in its neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should clean up before it worsens.
segments.speaker: PAR
